actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to encourage the establishment of wind erosion control and wildlife habitat areas which meet standards prescribed by the Secretary of Agriculture.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow as a credit against the income tax an amount equal to the qualified land conservation expenditures paid or incurred by the taxpayer. Defines "qualified land conservation expenditures" as any amount paid or incurred by the taxpayer to establish a wind erosion control and wildlife habitat area on land which was previously used for the production of agricultural products or for the sustenance of livestock. Limits the amount of such credit to the tax due minus the amount of other specified credits.

titles.title: A bill to encourage the establishment of wind erosion control and wildlife habitat areas which meet standards prescribed by the Secretary of Agriculture.
